amendment.description: To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to establish the United States Emergency Management Authority.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4560 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 87 - 11. Record Vote Number: 192.

action.text: Amendment SA 4560 proposed by Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S7309-7316, S7318-7320, S7325-7326) To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to establish the United States Emergency Management Authority.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4560 proposed by Senator Collins.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4560 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 87 - 11. Record Vote Number: 192.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4560 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 87 - 11. Record Vote Number: 192.
